medium: Wool, silk; needle chain stitch, double chain stitch, detached chain stitch, cretan stitch
title: Tent hanging
description: No backing cloth. Hand jwoven indigo-dyed pieced wool ground with polychrome wool and silk embroidery. There is no finishing treatment on the edges. Red dominates. Large center square pattern with 2 1/2\" - 3\" border all sides.
creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
